abstract: Do you often forget to proofread your outgoing Outlook messages?
snippet: Do you often forget to proofread your outgoing Outlook messages?
lead_paragraph: Do you often forget to proofread your outgoing Outlook messages? Recent versions of the commonly used Microsoft program include an option to check the spelling automatically in a message before you send it. Just go to the Tools menu to Options, then click on the Spelling tab. Put a check in the box next to “Always check spelling before sending” and click the O.K. button.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Check Spelling Automatically

abstract: The new Everex gPC TC2502 computer runs GOS, a version of Linux specially designed to run Google applications like GMail and Google Documents.
snippet: The new Everex gPC TC2502 computer runs GOS, a version of Linux specially designed to run Google applications like GMail and Google Documents.
lead_paragraph: Advocates of Linux, the free open-source operating system, like to say that buying a standard-issue computer involves a Microsoft Tax, because you have no choice but to pay for Windows. New versions of Linux and inexpensive hardware like the new Everex gPC TC2502 make that tax avoidable.

headline.main: Circuits: A Computer That Works With Google, Not Microsoft

abstract: Merrill Lynch is subpoenaing an Internet service provider and Microsoft to identify the sender of “explicit racial remarks” in e-mail messages to black investment bankers within the company, a spokesman for the investment bank said.
